alert.note: Alert for Orange; Riverside; San Bernardino (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued February 26 at 5:19AM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...AMBER Alert... The following message is transmitted at the request of CA California Highway Patrol. AN AMBER ALERT IS BEING ISSUED BY THE CALIFORNIA HIGHWAY PATROL ON BEHALF OF THE RIVERSIDE POLICE DEPARTMENT. ON FEBRUARY 26... 2023... AT 12 18 AM... LILIANNA ACOSTA AND ELIAS ACOSTA WERE ABDUCTED FROM RIVERSIDE... CALIFORNIA. LILIANNA ACOSTA IS A 6 YEAR OLD HISPANIC FEMALE... 3 FEET 2 INCHES TALL... WEIGHING 50 POUNDS... WITH BROWN HAIR AND BROWN EYES. SECOND VICTIM... ELIAS ACOSTA IS A 2 YEAR OLD HISPANIC MALE... 2 FEET 8 INCHES TALL... WEIGHING 30 POUNDS... WITH BROWN HAIR AND BROWN EYES. THE SUSPECT... FRANK ACOSTAORTEGA... IS A 27 YEAR OLD HISPANIC MALE... STANDING 5 FEET 8 INCHES TALL... WEIGHING 200 POUNDS WITH BLACK HAIR AND BROWN EYES. FRANK ACOSTAORTEGA IS BELIEVED TO BE WEARING A LONGSLEEVE BLACK SHIRT AND BLACK PANTS. THE SUSPECT SHOULD BE CONSIDERED ARMED AND DANGEROUS. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN DRIVING A SILVER BMW 335I... WITH CALIFORNIA LICENSE PLATE NUMBER 9 A Q R 8 0 5. IF SEEN CALL 9 1 1
